title: The Getting of Wisdom (1978 - Australia) [Bruce Beresford] drama
description:
The Getting of Wisdom (1978 - Australia)

Drama

director . . . . Bruce Beresford
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0076079/


Australian Film Institute - WON - Best Adapted Screenplay

Filmed at Ballarat and Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Oscar-nominated director Bruce Beresford crafts a tender coming-of-age tale that introduces one of Australian literature's most beloved characters to the screen, Laura Tweedle Rambotham. Chronicling her stormy passage through the sedate halls of an expensive Melbourne finishing school, the film delivers a rich and amusing portrait of an imaginative country girl who refuses to be broken to fit the mold of a Victorian-era young lady. Arriving in the dowdy clothes of her rural home, Laura is mercilessly teased until she learns to give as well as she gets.


Video: XviD, 720x400, 25.000 fps, 1783 Kbps, 01h37m12s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 224 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, optional Russian subtitles
